mapper.insert: insert into product_tbl(cate_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_discount, pro_publisher, pro_content, pro_up_folder, pro_img, pro_amount, pro_buy) values(#{cate_code}, #{pro_name}, #{pro_price}, #{pro_discount}, #{pro_publisher}, #{pro_content}, #{pro_up_folder}, #{pro_img}, #{pro_amount}, #{pro_buy})
mapper.select:
select pro_code, cate_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_discount, pro_publisher, pro_content, pro_up_folder, pro_img, pro_amount, pro_buy, pro_date, pro_update from product_tbl where pro_buy = 'Y'
limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from product_tbl where pro_buy = 'Y'

if.if: and pro_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or pro_publisher like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
